projects.name: Confluence
projects.description: Confluence is annual cultural fest of NIT Kurukshetra . conflu.org is the official Website of this Fest . Developed Site using React JS, Node Js, Firebase Firestore, CSS. Contributed in the front end of this project

projects.name: Servizy
projects.description: Hostel Service Management It is a Platform that aims at solving day-to-day problems of Hosteliers It is an android Project written in Java. Build using XML on the frontend and Firebase cloud functions on Backend With Android Studio

projects.name: Vision
projects.description: This is a platform that aims at guiding students about their career or their field of interest by making a common platform for counsellors and students to come together. It is written in Java (Android) used Firebase as a database.

projects.name: News App
projects.description: This News App can be used to get the latest headlines in your country, Search for news according to relevance, time and popularity. Backend using Newsapi.org  Developed using Android Studio, Java, XML
